department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
description: Provide various dental supplies for Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) at various Institutions in British Columbia in accordance with the attached hereto as Annex “A” during the period of the Standing Offer, on an “as and when requested” basis. The period of the Standing Offer is for three years from October 1, 2023 to September 30, 2026, with an option to extend for an additional one-year period. The estimated value is approximately $350,000.00 over 3 years, applicable taxes included. Actual usage can vary. This requirement falls under the Common Classification System (G0) covering Health and Social Services to which the World Trade Organization – Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP) (Annex 4), and CFTA (annex 502.1B) does not apply.
full_summary:
## Tender No. WS4057226866-Doc4057390305 - Dental Supplies

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Standing Offer for the provision of dental supplies to the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) at various institutions in British Columbia.

### Tender Details

| **Tender Details** | **English** | **French** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Tender Reference | WS4057226866-Doc4057390305 | WS4057226866-Doc4057390305 |
| Amendment Number | 1 | 1 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4057226866 | WS4057226866 |
| Publication Date | September 7, 2023 | September 7, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | September 25, 2023, 14:00:00 | September 25, 2023, 14:00:00 |
| Amendment Date | September 15, 2023 | September 15, 2023 |
| Contract Start Date | October 1, 2023 | October 1, 2023 |
| Contract End Date | September 30, 2026 | September 30, 2026 |

### Standing Offer Details

The term of the Standing Offer is three years, with an option to extend for an additional one-year period. The estimated value of the contract is approximately $350,000.00 over three years, inclusive of applicable taxes.

### Unrestricted Tender

This requirement falls under the Common Classification System (G0) covering Health and Social Services, to which the World Trade Organization - Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) do not apply.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Contact Information

The point of contact for this tender is:

* Sangeeta Dutt, PSPC
* Email: [sangeeta.dutt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sangeeta.dutt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice URL

The tender notice is available on [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16610535?extsite=MTY2MTA1MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](
